original_title: Tong Tana - En resa till Borneos inre
overview: A Swedish crew trekked into the depths of the endangered Bornean rainforest to film this poetic documentary about the plight of the Penans and their most unusual ally, Bruno Manser - a young Swiss who has rejected 'civilization' to join the tribe and help fight international logging.
title: Tong Tana - En resa till Borneos inre
